product_name: Sherpa Adventure Gear Rapti Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Wear the men's Rapti Shorts from Sherpa Adventure Gear for great stretch and good looks while hiking, bouldering and traveling. Durable double-weave fabric has 4-way stretch. Gusset aids mobility and comfort. 2 zip thigh pockets (1 low, 1 high) and 1 rear zip pocket; open hand pockets. Sherpa Adventure Gear Rapti Shorts for men have a 12 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Wear the men's Rapti Shorts from Sherpa Adventure Gear for great stretch and good looks while hiking, bouldering and traveling.
